CheckBoxPreference.app:summary: Enabled by default. This will allow SyncPlay to save your connect info for the next time you open the app.
CheckBoxPreference.app:title: Remember join info

CheckBoxPreference.app:summary: If you are not satisfied with the player's video load times before and during playback, you can use custom buffer sizes (Use at your own risk).
CheckBoxPreference.app:title: Use Custom Buffer Sizes

SeekBarPreference.app:summary: Default is 50 (50000 milliseconds). This determines the maximum buffer size before starting to play the video. If you don't know what this is, don't change it.
SeekBarPreference.app:title: Custom max buffer size

SeekBarPreference.app:summary: Default is 15 (15000 milliseconds). Decrease this value to play video faster but there is a possibility that the player may fail or even crash. Change at your own risk.
SeekBarPreference.app:title: Custom min buffer size

SeekBarPreference.app:summary: Default is 2500 milliseconds. This represents the buffer size when SEEKING or UNPAUSING the video. Change this if you're not satisfied with the small delay when seeking video.
SeekBarPreference.app:title: Custom playback buffer size (ms)

CheckBoxPreference.app:summary: Enable this if you wanna be set automatically as ready once you enter the room.
CheckBoxPreference.app:title: Set as ready first-hand

SeekBarPreference.app:summary: If someone is behind with the value you select here, your video will be rewinded to match with the one behind.
SeekBarPreference.app:title: Rewind when someone is X secs behind

SeekBarPreference.app:summary: Default is 18. This will change the subtitles size.
SeekBarPreference.app:title: Subtitle Size

SwitchPreference.app:summary: Enabled by default. Turn off if you encounter issues connecting to the server. This will tell SyncPlay to connect to the servers with a secure connection (TLSv1.3). It is recommended to use a secure encrypted connection rather than a bare unencrypted connection (Turn off to use unencrypted connection). Unencrypted connection is however, faster.
SwitchPreference.app:title: Use Secure Connection (TLSv1.3) [Available Soon]

Preference.android:summary: Reset everything to its default value (Recommended)
Preference.app:title: Reset Default Settings
